website_summaries.verdict: A generously sized suitcase with a sturdy polycarbonate shell. The best available.
cons: Easily carries more than 50 lbs., which could result in baggage fee

customer_reviews.title: Too Big for International Travel
customer_reviews.text: I'd like to warn all consumers who may want to purchase this bag for international travel (as I did). Yes, the bag's interior dimensions are just within the 62" total size (L+H+W) limitation required by international air carriers. However, the dimension advertised is deceptive; it does not include the additional length and width caused by the handles and wheels. That makes this bag over-sized for international travel. In other words, it's too big.
customer_reviews.author: dougsdeck

customer_reviews.title: Not a good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. Zipper broke on very first trip. Can’t return it because already wrote name on case and applied identification stickers. This was a replacement for 20 year old pieces that were in better shape than this one is now. Wish I had my $140 back! Don’t buy. They say from France but they are made in China.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Beware of the flimsy handle on this Delsey luggage.
customer_reviews.text: On our very FIRST use we were unable to successfully slide the handle back into the suitcase for travel. It slid out fine but when we tried to slide it back down it would not budge. I've had it less than 2 weeks and am not at all happy with this product. Expected to get more than ONE use out of it after paying over $100 for it. To date the handle remains out and now we are unable to use it due to airline restrictions that the handle must be down for travel.
customer_reviews.author: RACHAEL DIAZ

customer_reviews.title: Good looking, light weight
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my parents as I use this brand and am obsessed with it. Mine has taken me around the world for the past 7 years and still is holding up. This one is an updated design and equally as light weight. Holding up great so far. I always recommend hard shell luggage for durability and also bc it is likely crammed in with other people’s luggage which has been at hotels (I was told by a friend a horror story that bed bugs on other ppls luggage can go to other fabric luggage-no thanks!)
customer_reviews.author: ChicagoBoho

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, super durable
customer_reviews.text: I travel a lot. I wear out suitcases from the airline handling. These last the longest. They still get damaged and could be improved, but a clear stand-out from the rest. Free of most of the failures that I have had with other bags. I held back one star because the zipper on the inner divider between halves is very small and will fail, just like my other older Delsey, however, these are not serious bag failures. You pay a lot for these bags so I wish they would fix that
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: I can lift w/ two fingers
customer_reviews.text: My hubby bought a small carry-on size of these suitcases, and I was so impressed when I could lift it with one finger. I asked for the largest one available as my Xmas present. I am able to lift that one with two fingers. It looks so classy and with the larger wheels, it moves so much smoother and turns on a dime. I can't wait to use this the first time out. I just hope it doesn't get dented too badly, as others have mentioned.
customer_reviews.author: V. LaBore

customer_reviews.title: Zipper failed on second trip
customer_reviews.text: The suitcase came unzipped on my second flight. It was not over-packed and did not appear to be mis-handled. It was locked with the TSA-approved lock, that’s the only place the zipper held, see in the pics. Items fell out, couldn’t find them on the luggage carousel. I bought this suitcase because of the high ratings. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon buyer

customer_reviews.title: helium aero line has size choices
customer_reviews.text: This larger suitcase is my second Delsey Helium Aero. I found the 24" to be very good, so when I needed something larger, this was my first choice. I've traveled once with it - it's exactly what I expected. When packed, it's big and heavy - fine for the strong athletic type of person. For others, two smaller bags might be easier to manage. Like the color.
customer_reviews.author: Dean F

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL BUT SCRATCHED EVEN BEFORE GETTING TO AIRPORT!
customer_reviews.text: Love the Cobalt blue color and slick glossy look. Unfortunately, this glossy finish is more prone to being scratched than the other Delsey polyester or Matte finish (Titanium) product lines (which I also own). Even before I get to the airport, it's already scratched from opened on a bare floor or brushed against another hard surface. The inside compartment is standard for Delsey with one zippered divider side and insert pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Deliciousworld

customer_reviews.title: Prefer the design of soft sided suitcases
customer_reviews.text: Overall I’m happy with this suitcase; however, I’m not thrilled that the contents having to be divided between the two sides. When having to open the suitcase on trips where I have to store my clothes in the suitcase, the contents fall out when I open it unless I remember to strap them in each time before I close it. This is the case with all hard sided suitcases from what I can tell. I don’t understand why they can’t design a hard sided case that opens like a soft sided one. This suitcase is attractive and appears to be well made.
customer_reviews.author: babetsba

customer_reviews.title: Great luggage for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy with the Helium Aero carry-on spinner, than I also got the next two sizes up including the 29 inch model. I love the blue color, and the quality seems very good considering the economical price. I've used the Aero carry-on on many trips, and it has held up very well. This isn't luxury luggage that is made of carbon fiber and may last 50 years. But, for the price I am very happy and it should last me a number of years.
customer_reviews.author: DS785

customer_reviews.title: 45k miles of planes and trucks in 3 months and doing great
customer_reviews.text: In the past 3 months I have taken a pair of these suitcases on multiple overseas trips to Europe, Africa and Asia as well as trips around the US by plane and moving van. They have held up well and had no problems in some airports a bit notorious for being rough on luggage. They have been loaded to 70lbs/26kg limits and done fine. They work especially well if you use packing cubes or similar packing aids to organize your clothes. Security was able to do an inspection and relics the suitcases just fine according to the note left in the bags.
customer_reviews.author: TexasPhotographer

customer_reviews.title: Quality piece
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful luggage, the color is exactly as pictured. The product isn’t flimsy plastic feeling and has plenty of room and pockets on the inside. The lock is recessed as described and positioned perfectly. The zippers are quality, don’t skip and are operationally smooth. The expander ads enough extra room without compromising the integrity and overall strength of the luggage. The wheels are quiet and maneuver with ease. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: AudiED

customer_reviews.title: Best suitcase I have ever owned!
customer_reviews.text: This lightweight suite case is durable and good looking. The wheels (which were a concern) are as strong as they were the day we bought this. Can't say that for other suit cases we have. Love the hard sided, we pack a lot of food in glass containers (we live internationally) when we shop on vacation and nothing has ever broken! Would recommend it to anyone looking for a quality suit case, we actually now have 2!!
customer_reviews.author: Paige Peters

customer_reviews.title: The dimensions listed for this bag are INSIDE dimensions
customer_reviews.text: The dimensions listed for this bag are INSIDE dimensions - the 29 inch bag has its dimensions listed in a pamphlet that comes with the bag as 31.75x20.75x12.75 which comes to 65.25 linear inches = extra charges!!!
customer_reviews.author: SteveP

customer_reviews.title: Broke first trip
customer_reviews.text: This was our fourth purchase of this suitcase, 2 x 25 inch and 2 x 29 inch versions. Really liked the suitcase, but the zipper on this one detached from the case on the first use - not at all overfilled (this suitcase is huge so if you overfill it you will be over 50 lb limit). Did not notice until after the return window closed.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Jung

customer_reviews.title: HUGE DENT and scratches when It arrived (see pic)
customer_reviews.text: The box wasn't damaged, which means they just sent a damaged product. I'm giving this 3 stars because it's a beautiful piece of luggage, but the seller stinks. And, it also means, I guess, that it damages fairly easily...unless someone smashed it with a hammer, which is kind of what it looks like.
customer_reviews.author: Avner

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, tough, and easy to roll.
customer_reviews.text: I have four of these suitcases and I constantly travel around the world, these look better than most, are super light, very tough and have never lost a wheel, and very reasonably priced given the quality. Fortunately not many others have figured this out so easy to spot your bags coming down the shute!
customer_reviews.author: Rick B

customer_reviews.title: It is very big.
customer_reviews.text: Really nice looking piece of luggage. Highly rated. Has everything, spinners. wheels, TSA locks. Thought I wanted the large checked bag, traveling to Europe for 2 weeks. When it arrived realized it would not work for me, It is huge. Outside measures 32" H x 20" W x 12" D.. Not sure it meets requirement some airlines have of max 62 linear inches. If you looking for this sized luggage than this is the best one for you.
customer_reviews.author: J.B.

customer_reviews.title: Great Luggage for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Very lightweight. This suitcase is much more durable than you would think when you first get it. I have paid over three times as much for another brand that had issues on the 2nd trip. I make about 6 trips to Asia each year. No issues with these suitcases. Several c0-workers have now moved to the Delsey Helium Aero line after seeing mine.
customer_reviews.author: JoeSlay61

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: On the first day of my vacation in Ireland, I was rolling the luggage quite a while to reach the tour bus. Along with 30 others we moved along until the spinner wheels hit a bump and down it went and brought me with it. The luggage scraped up, as well as, my leg. On the trip it continued to not roll smoothly. Pain in the “ “!! I am going to request a return.
customer_reviews.author: L. M.

customer_reviews.title: This bag is just awesome! Held its own in my recent European trip-6 ...
customer_reviews.text: This bag is just awesome! Held its own in my recent European trip-6 buses, 3 flight changes each way, a train, and bumpy cobblestones. Buy it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: GA

customer_reviews.title: Big and nice color
customer_reviews.text: I just got this and it's nice and big like I expected. It's very nice looking and the color is beautiful. I also am very happy that it has the 2 wheels at each corner, so there are 8 wheels. So much more sturdy. I haven't used it yet. I plan to use it this summer. I just hope that it doesn't get dented up and scratched and destroyed on just 1 flight. Have to wait and see. After my trip, maybe, if I remember, I'll come back and say what happened to the luggage.
customer_reviews.author: ReN

customer_reviews.title: Right Size for 50 Pounds
customer_reviews.text: We had a bigger suitcase but it was always over 50 pounds when we filled it. So we bought a pair of these (blue and pink) so we could identify them more easily at the luggage carousel. They are lightweight and roll great. The straps and sections inside keep everything in place. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph FUller

customer_reviews.title: Works well, but there is a problem...
customer_reviews.text: I had previously bought a smaller version of this case, which I like - I travel a lot for work. This one works well, but smells awful - chemical odor, like bad plastic. I would have returned it, if I had not immediately needed it for a trip. I have sprayed it several times with fabreeze but that has yet to help. As I pack my clothing in bags the odor has not spread.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Elkins

customer_reviews.title: Light weight great construction
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for our upcoming vacation to Europe we are impressed with the construction, color, and packability of this suit case. We weren’t sure what TSA approved locks were until we got these and find them unique. They roll very well. Expand the right amount so as to keep you honest on how much you’re packing for your trip. We expect them to do a great job on our vacation.
customer_reviews.author: David Sheehan

customer_reviews.title: Worthless Warranty!
customer_reviews.text: I used this luggage twice and the strap that holds the clothes inside the suitcase broke. This was supposed to be highly rated and durable but obviously not! The warranty is a joke! You have to pay for shipping to an authorized dealer or take it to one and there are none close. So basically this warranty is worthless!! Don't waste your money!!
customer_reviews.author: Mom who loves games

customer_reviews.title: Scratches and Marks Really Show
customer_reviews.text: Nice light suitcase. One thing I did not take into account when I purchased this suitcase was how easily it becomes scratched up. If I had to do it again, I would not have purchased a shiny, glossy dark blue suitcase that shows all scratches. Besides the issue of scratching, I love the suitcase itself.
customer_reviews.author: Xpyerq

customer_reviews.title: Have Luggage, Will Travel.
customer_reviews.text: As I write this, I have been traveling in France with this one suitcase. It is roomier than my last one and enabled me to only bring this one piece for my two week vacation. The best part is the maneuverability of this luggage. My last luggage had 4 wheels and it lasted for only two vacations before the wheels broke. This luggage has 8 wheels and it’s very easy to move in any direction - even on the cobblestoned streets of Paris. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Matou

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE $20 return shipping fee.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very large suitcase, the sides feel flimsy and the zipper was difficult. They charge a $20 return shipping fee so if you are unsure do not order as it costs $20 to take look at it in your home.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Quesnel

customer_reviews.title: Very happy purchase
customer_reviews.text: So far I think this piece of luggage is great. Good looking and sturdy, it has already survived two big trips. Wheels are quiet and wonderfully smooth. I love this purchase. Now, the only question will be how long it endures. Time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: WillsPracticalYoga

customer_reviews.title: I purchased new and got used!
customer_reviews.text: Is the second one I have purchased from Amazon and this one is even more damaged than the first! I declined the offer for a used case but this one has certainly gone through baggage claim a few times! I really want this suitcase, but will I keep getting used bags?
customer_reviews.author: Hollyberry

customer_reviews.title: It was nice while it lasted.
customer_reviews.text: Well it was nice while it lasted. 3 years. Maybe that is the life of the product. Not sure. My husband has his luggage from 20 years ago. Just don't make them like they used to. Wheel broke. Hoping to find replacement pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Great bag overall!
customer_reviews.text: This bag replaced one that was destroyed by the airline and porters at a cruise terminal. It was a wonderful choice and value for the price! It is easy to maneuver and holds everything you will need.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Leube

customer_reviews.title: Easy Travel
customer_reviews.text: How sweet it is! This Delsey Helium Aero was the perfect choice. It is large but perfect for a long trip. Traveled to Germany for a month and packed everything in 1 suitcase. t was so easy to navigate thru FRA and LHR. The color blue color was a wonderful choice and love the TSA lock.
customer_reviews.author: Bcjrstl

customer_reviews.title: Never to buy.
customer_reviews.text: First trip abroad, bag was damaged dented. Missed my 30 day return time. Lousy bag. Stick with better brand name or worst, so that you can keep it or throw it away.
customer_reviews.author: Motakaka

customer_reviews.title: HUGE but better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Just finished a 3 week trip and the 29" handled it fine. The expansion of the case helped a bunch but boy does it get heavy when fully packed. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: It's very light, but the material seems not really durable. So fat, it survived round trip from us to Asia. So maybe okay! It's kinda cheap looking though.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: great product!
customer_reviews.text: bought this for my husband for our 12 day trip and he loved it. had more than enough space to pack all his clothes and 4 pairs of shoes including a pair of boots and looks great. wheels fantastically, very smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Mtzm09

customer_reviews.title: Durable!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is huge. And when full, it is easy to maneuver. Holds up well to impacts. Wish I had purchased the next size smaller instead.
customer_reviews.author: wade daniels

customer_reviews.title: Very Tough Luggage
customer_reviews.text: We purchase the large Delsey Paris Helium Aero Hardside luggage for a trip to Europe. The luggage had plenty of room for our 2 week trip. The 2 inch expansion zipper allowed us to bring back all our souvenirs. The luggage held up great from all the baggage handlers throwing it everywhere and the flight too and from Europe. I highly recommend it if are going to travel a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Blackwell

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Quick arrival. Used for NYE trip. Scratches super easy. Seems durable. Some hems were loose/hainging but seemed sewn fine. Will see after multiple trips. Pretty and visable color for baggage pickup (blue).
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Light but fragile
customer_reviews.text: It looks good, but Theo luggage got all scratched after one use. I am already on the second luggage because it breaks easily. I do t recommend it for long international trips
customer_reviews.author: odete

customer_reviews.title: Great Luggage!
customer_reviews.text: Love the color (blue) and ease of rolling. It probably had 40 lbs in it and was still easy enough for my 1 year old to roll around the living room. Will update if anything changes after airplane trip.
customer_reviews.author: jlawson

customer_reviews.title: Locked out of my own suitcase
customer_reviews.text: One of my suitcase came locked. There’s no site to message the manufacturer to get the code to open it. You have to call during business hours to get support. Not ideal.
customer_reviews.author: AMcc

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I need a luggage that i didn't have to pull because of back issues. This piece of luggage did the job. easy to maneuver. Very light weight. I would definitely recommend this luggage. Did not have any issues with it.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Jones

customer_reviews.title: Top notch - DELSEY
customer_reviews.text: Bought this bag for a trip to Napa/Sonoma in case I needed to carry a few bottles home (which I did). I was surprised at how large the bag was inside. More than enough room for my things. Extremely light weight, well constructed zippers, and I really liked the combination lock mechanism.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory L. Schell

customer_reviews.title: Very durable
customer_reviews.text: I like how easy it is to maneuver. Wheels are smooth rolling. Plenty of room for my two weeks vacation!
customer_reviews.author: Lee h

customer_reviews.title: Awesome luggage
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of them for my husband and I for our first cruise, and they didn’t disappoint! Hold everything without a problem, easy to maneuver.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: then we loved how easy they were to roll through the airport ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought two for my daughter and I to go to Amsterdam. We could not believe how spacious they were and how light weight. then we loved how easy they were to roll through the airport and up to the check in area. However, upon arriving in Amsterdam, and retrieving our bags, we soon realized that one of my daughter's bags wheel sets had collapsed in and was now tilted at a funny angle. It still worked reasonably well, but tipped over if you didn't hold it. There was no way that we were strong enough to pop it back into place.
customer_reviews.author: Teja H Anderson (Dorothy)

customer_reviews.title: Cracked on second trip
customer_reviews.text: The shell cracked after the second use. I suppose it was the airline's gorilla baggage handlers but I would have hoped the manufacturer would have made the shell strong enough to withstand the inevitable poor treatment by the airline. I was very unhappy to find out that the warranty will not cover this.
customer_reviews.author: Raquel Leone

customer_reviews.title: A case of fine quality...
customer_reviews.text: Nice case for traveling. Took it to Ireland. I survived 5 planes and my daily use with barely a scratch. I holds a lot, so be careful to weigh it b4 checking in.It rolls great and is hard to knock over.
customer_reviews.author: Pour Boy

customer_reviews.title: Hands down, the BEST!!
customer_reviews.text: Without a doubt the BEST piece of luggage I have ever purchased & used! So well made, expandable to pack just about everything you could possibly need, plush inside, light weight & so easy to manage with the well made wheels. Loved this Helium Aero 29", that I purchased the identical but at 25". Perfect 3 piece set; carry on, 29", and 25"! You will not regret purchasing the Helium Aero!!
customer_reviews.author: IIWII

customer_reviews.title: poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality. I used one time and the zipper broke!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Doyle

customer_reviews.title: we need a good quality suitcase that is light
customer_reviews.text: We have bought this suitcase many times in the past. Since we travel quite a lot, we need a good quality suitcase that is light. It was also a great price. No need to take the car out and search for a good price. Thank you Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: binali

customer_reviews.title: Great great lightweight suitcase for a decent price
customer_reviews.text: Great great lightweight suitcase for a decent price. However, this size is so large that if you pack it well with clothes it will be over 50 lbs, thus costing you an arm and a leg at the airport. Great for traveling to ski places with bulky snow clothes that don't weigh much.
customer_reviews.author: Mathew S.

customer_reviews.title: Too heavy
customer_reviews.text: Luggage scratches and marks easily. Is very heavy--almost 13 pounds. Would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian F. Snead

customer_reviews.title: Fits everything and protects
customer_reviews.text: Fits everything and protects it well. You can't help it getting scratched in transit, but at least it's protecting all the contents. I've used it multiple times and no cracks. It is pretty big so if you pack it too tightly to the point where you have to sit on it to close it, it will go over the baggage limit. I tend to overpack and i still had plenty of room for things like hair dryers and irons, make up, shoes, clothes, toiletries, without everything being squashed and ruined.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Trolley wheels are the best.
customer_reviews.text: This matching Delsey carry-on is super smooth to roll, great design. I love it. Again, scratches easily in baggage when I have to check it. Also, came with a non-working locking system, so I had to use a regular lock. It was a last minute purchase for a big trip and could not return it for one that has a working lock. Now it's scratched, so I guess we still can't return it.
customer_reviews.author: Paddy

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I have used this suitcase 4 times and the wheel broke off while on holiday.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking but !
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful bag. Easy to manage around the airport but it's a pain to open in tight quarters. The bag folds in half so you need lots of room on the bed to spread it out just to get into it. It also scratched badly after my first vacation due to normal handling by the airlines. The wheels and handle functioned very nicely.
customer_reviews.author: JF SACCO

customer_reviews.title: Happy With This
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! If you dont like seeing occasional dings on surface dont get this kind at all. I wanted an away suitcase but didnt have time to wait for one. This is just as good. Took to UK and loved it.
customer_reviews.author: GCS18

customer_reviews.title: Happy Traveler!
customer_reviews.text: This suitcase is awesome!! I filled it to the max, of course had to pay for overweight baggage, but it was the best suitcase for my recent trip. As heavy as I packed it, it still wheeled as if it was light as a feather! Would highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: TisHerself

customer_reviews.title: The Helium Aear has tons of room and rolls very easily. So far haven't had any of the zipper ...
customer_reviews.text: I travel from the States to Asia once a year and didn't have any problems with the size on the interenational flights. The Helium Aear has tons of room and rolls very easily. So far haven't had any of the zipper problems others have stated. Might be because after reading those complaints I have been very careful with them.
customer_reviews.author: Lievyon

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made luggage that stinks to high heavens!
customer_reviews.text: The plastic may be polycarbonate but it's very thin and the high-gloss surface already has lots of tiny scratches all over it. However, the worst part is the chemical smell - and sure enough, the tag has a "California Proposition 65 Warning" for carcinogens. Certainly not something I want my clothes to sit in for hours. I have the window open now and the suitcase in front of it trying to keep the smell in the house down until I can return it...
customer_reviews.author: vca2004

customer_reviews.title: Great for air travel. Fits airline requirements.
customer_reviews.text: Took this to Spain and it was extremely easy to pack and to maneuver indoors and out. I would buy another if I needed one!
customer_reviews.author: T. Land

customer_reviews.title: Good size
customer_reviews.text: Love the size. My husband travels a lot although he could not fit the case in certain cars. Won't fit in 2016 Chevy Camero so be careful on the cars you rent another then that it held up well.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Clemons-Hocking

customer_reviews.title: a great suit case
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good suit case for the money - many great features - light weight - very easy to roll- lots of room
customer_reviews.author: Tim  Beckett

customer_reviews.title: Happy consumer!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for a great price. You can fit a lot in this suit case and meets Frontier Airlines guidelines as of Feb 2017. No issues with wheels so far and they work great!
customer_reviews.author: BoTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: reviews
customer_reviews.text: I read so many reviews about luggage before I bought this. It had some negative reviews but not as many as must so I purchased it. Took it on a cruise and it worked fine. So easy to roll because each wheel is dual. Recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Delsey Luggage Expectation
customer_reviews.text: I like the color and the maneuverability of the luggage. I haven't taken my trip yet so I cannot say anything about how the product stands up to going thru baggage claims and all of that but I like how it moves and that it is lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Tripluv

customer_reviews.title: Many Features
customer_reviews.text: I receive my luggage with a large dent in one of the corners and I was able to push it out from the inside. Thank you hard-side cases for this possibility! I really like this luggage and the many features.
customer_reviews.author: KRK

customer_reviews.title: Got here the next day!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this from "Racy's" online. They waited a week to email us that it was back ordered. The amazon price was within 5% and with prime shipping it arrived the next day. We have the 25" suitcase as well and loved that it stood out in a sea of black at the airport. They are lightweight and I stuffed them to the brim and still was under the limit.
customer_reviews.author: Bingmama

customer_reviews.title: Spacy and manageable
customer_reviews.text: I recently took this suitcase on a long international trip. It was great for packing more stuff than I need yet having room to bring back more than I started off with. It was easy to maneuver through airports and I'll be using it again for my next trip.
customer_reviews.author: S. Cruff

customer_reviews.title: its not bad on the eyes
customer_reviews.text: The last suitcase I owned before this was a hand-me-down from my parents that I received 15 years ago. They've made huuuge advances in luggage technology since then! Portable, incredibly durable, and surprisingly light; its not bad on the eyes, either. I will be replacing or adding luggage with this company to suit my needs.
customer_reviews.author: FIRE

customer_reviews.title: One of the better options in the price range
customer_reviews.text: Great quality luggage. Color stands out in the sea of black suitcases. Great, smooth rolling wheels.
customer_reviews.author: DandyMT

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: FedEx SUCKS instructions to leave inside my breezeway, instead left in middle of my walkway for anyone to swipe Bottom of box was opened item was scuffed on outside and zipper was sewn in backwards sent it back
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Dragged this thing all over Europe for 3 weeks. Very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: John P. Bitting

customer_reviews.title: Don't listen to negative reviews, this is legitimately 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe anyone would give this less than 5 stars. Here are the pros 1. Glossy finish is stylish and looks just like the picture 2. Lightweigh - I own the carry on piece as well and surprisingly this larger version does not weigh much more than that 3. Wheels are great and very mobile; turns well 4. Handle pops out easily. Some reviewers criticized this but there was no problem with this at all
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and very light
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and very light. I had purchased the 27" Delsey Helium Aero a few years ago. It was a great buy, so sturdy and I can pack a lot of stuff in it. I prefer it to my other much more expensive suitcases.
customer_reviews.author: Romance reader

customer_reviews.title: Smart design
customer_reviews.text: Smartly designed, easy to pack, easy to maneuver. Durable. Nice color!
customer_reviews.author: Edward Marritz

customer_reviews.title: great bag for overseas travel
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy bag, well made. I do agree with some of the reviews that it scratches a bit easily, and also it is on the verge of being oversized. It is definitely 29inches WITHOUT the wheels. United Airlines did not give me any problems about it however. It held enough clothes for myself and my toddler for a week in the UK.
customer_reviews.author: BondFam

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great suitcase lite weight the only suitcase I will ever buy
customer_reviews.author: Joe Shapiro

customer_reviews.title: Nice bags for the price
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful bags and they hold a lot!! However, after just one trip, I like others, noticed quite a bit of scratching. We will see how they hold up after a few more trips. They are light weight and very easy to maneuver.
customer_reviews.author: Foster Dog MomTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Tough and looks great!
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised how great these looked when they arrived. Used 2 sizes on a major trip to 3 cities in Asia. From Taxi to taxi, airport to airpot, and in and out of hotels, they were easy to roll, pickup, and held up very well in a very tough environment. When they came out of the baggage claim, they also looked shiny and better than the other bags!
customer_reviews.author: GG

customer_reviews.title: Great luggage! It's gone through several international flights
customer_reviews.text: Great luggage! It's gone through several international flights, had it loaded with items to take to Europe for friends and everything arrived in great condition. Barely any marks on luggage and wheels are great! Bought a second one we liked it so much.
customer_reviews.author: Sandpile

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic luggage with great warranty
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic luggage. I recommend getting a luggage scale to weigh it so that it doesn't go over the airline limit. The warranty included makes it an easy decision. It used to be $115 so it might be worth waiting until the prices comes down a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A new generation of suitcases
customer_reviews.text: Great looking , light weight and is really a double sized suitcase that holds a lot. Easy roll trolley spinners are great, too. Now that airlines are charging for over weight bags it makes sense to have the lightest weight base possible. Polycarbonate is the way to go. Rugged and light weight. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Heath

customer_reviews.title: This has been a great suitcase especially for this price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband who travels extensively for his job. This has been a great suitcase especially for this price!
customer_reviews.author: Twinmom+1

customer_reviews.title: Great suitcase at an affordable value!
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. Held up perfectly for my last trip. I used it for a 3 week trip and had extra room for souvenirs. Rollers and handle worked perfectly even over bumpy sidewalks.
customer_reviews.author: C. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Had no problems with large size while flying around the world.
customer_reviews.text: They fit on our international flight from Newark to Beijing to Japan. We still use them for travel to this day
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Great for travel with plenty of room and very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Fuchs

customer_reviews.title: GREAT LUGGAGE
customer_reviews.text: Bought this luggage for a trip from South Carolina to Costa Rica with a few days in Washington DC. The luggage was moved twice while in Costa Rica as we moved from one hotel to another. Other than having a few scratches on the outer body the luggage is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Durham

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Luggage did not hold up well to rigors of multiple flights. Dents, scratches, and deformity of zipper area
customer_reviews.author: Lizzy D

customer_reviews.title: Super Suitcase.
customer_reviews.text: A super suitcase for travel. I needed a 29" bag, and I looked in the Amazon Warehouse for a deal and found it, Thanks, Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Love the new suitcase
customer_reviews.text: Love the new suitcase! Haven't used it yet but it has lots of room. Love the spinning and very lightweight for a big suitcase!
customer_reviews.author: VCook421

customer_reviews.title: I bought a dark blue and silver one and the blue shows scratches much worse than the silver
customer_reviews.text: Held up well for our trip to Mexico. I bought a dark blue and silver one and the blue shows scratches much worse than the silver.
customer_reviews.author: TT

customer_reviews.title: Buy something else.
customer_reviews.text: Found a crack in it after 3 months and just before it was a year old the handle stopped working & got stuck in the down position at the airport while heading back from an overseas trip. A waste of money, not happy with this purchase at all.
customer_reviews.author: Dpjr

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Durable and nice looking. 4 international flights and still looks new. Love the zipper center. Makes it easy and convenient
customer_reviews.author: Aghali

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love! So durable and lightweight! Got scratched a bit cuz we travelled from the U.S. to 3 different countries in Europe for a month, going through many streets and airports... was easy to maneuver around. Huge,spacious luggage.
customer_reviews.author: Krystle8

product_meta.title: DELSEY Paris Helium Aero Hardside Expandable Luggage with Spinner Wheels, Blue Cobalt, Checked-Large 29 Inch
product_meta.description: Size:Checked-Large 29 Inch| Color:Blue CobaltThe Helium Aero Collection from Delsey Paris is extremely lightweight and durable, designed for the frequent traveller. This 29 inch case expands up to 2 inches for maximum packing flexibility. The wheels and handles on this case are exceptional and provide the traveller with ease of use and a smooth ride. The four double spinner wheels keep ZERO weight on your arm and the dual locking handle system gives you the option to carry the bag different ways. The case also has a top and side carry handle for easy lifting into overhead bins or car trunks. Lastly, this case features an integrated recessed TSA approved lock which allows only TSA agents to inspect your bag without damaging your bag or lock. The Delsey Luggage Helium Aero collection is protected under a Worldwide Limited 10 Year Warranty.
feature_bullets: Lightweight and Durable: Made of 100% Polycarbonate, which is a material that is extremely resilient to cracking or breaking, with a deep metallic finish. The overall dimensions are 32 x 20.5 x 12.75 inches
Superior Maneuverability: The double spinner wheels assure exceptional maneuverability and keep ZERO weight on your arm.Body Dimensions 29x19.5x12.5 inches,Weight 12.5 lbs
Largest Capacity: This suitcase expands up to 2 inches for additional packing space. This feature is great for packing sovenirs on return journeys. Fully lined interior
Maximum Comfort: This carry on bag has a comfortable handle system that locks into two positions for ease of Use; TSA-accepted lock allows only TSA agents to open and inspect your bag

Convenient and Secure Packing: Two large fully-lined compartments with multiple pockets allow easy access and organization for all of your items. Web straps and a zippered divider secure clothing and help minimize wrinkles.Packing compartment in the lid comes with zippered divider to provide extra space for organizing
100% polycarbonate with glossy finish which makes the case extremely lightweight
Four twin spinner wheels assuring multi-directional rolling and optional stability with zero weight on your hand
Recessed "one-button" locking handle system with industrial grade aluminum tubes and molded ergonomic comfort grip handle
Fully lined interior with two compartments for packing and organizing clothes and travel accessories

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
